title: Brexit talks: What does it mean to go into the negotiating tunnel?
text:
The EU-27 has approved Michel Barnier's request to enter the negotiating tunnel with UK officials in an effort to reach a Brexit deal before next week's summit.

Boris Johnson's meeting with Leo Varadkar on Thursday appears to have brought a concession convincing the EU to start top-secret talks.

What is the tunnel?

The tunnel is Brussels jargon for intensive talks among a small core of negotiators carried out in total secrecy with the aim of hammering out a deal away from the prying eyes and loud objections of onlookers.

Documents are not published, press reaction or comment is off-limits and even the ambassadors of the EU-27 are not kept informed of progress in the regular way that is usual...
description: The EU-27 has approved Michel Barnier's request to enter the negotiating tunnel with UK officials in an effort to reach a Brexit deal before next week's summit.
